<a id="VisualShaderNodeTexture2DArrayParameter"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeTexture2DArrayParameter

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeTextureParameter](VisualShaderNodeTextureParameter.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNodeParameter](VisualShaderNodeParameter.md) **\<** [VisualShaderNode](VisualShaderNode.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A visual shader node for shader parameter (uniform) of type [Texture2DArray](Texture2DArray.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This parameter allows to provide a collection of textures for the shader. You can use [VisualShaderNodeTexture2DArray](VisualShaderNodeTexture2DArray.md) to extract the textures from array.
